mil.emp3.api.events

Class FeatureDrawEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<FeatureDrawEventEnum,IFeature>
      • mil.emp3.api.events.FeatureDrawEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<FeatureDrawEventEnum,IFeature>

    public abstract class FeatureDrawEvent
extends Event<FeatureDrawEventEnum,IFeature>
    This event class is generated during the process of drawing a feature.

      • getMap

        public abstract IMap getMap()
        This method return the map the event occurred on.
        Returns:

      • getUpdateData

        public abstract java.util.List<IEditUpdateData> getUpdateData()
        This method retrieves a list of object that identifies what was updated in the feature. It only applies to DRAW_UPDATE events.
        Returns:
        A list of IEditUpdateData object for DRAW_UPDATE events or null otherwise.
